channel.title: Barbara Comstock
channel.description: Barbara Comstock Member of the Virginia House of Delegates and Deputy Permanent Co-chair of the Convention (Remarks as Prepared for Delivery)

item.title: Greetings from Virginia, where the American story began.
item.author: Barbara Comstock

item.title: What started with entrepreneurs arriving in Jamestown in 1607 ­ and grew with the wisdom of Washington, Jefferson, Madison ­ shaped a nation and the world.
item.author: Barbara Comstock

item.title: Lovers of freedom and liberty, members of all races and religions ­ from across the globe ­ now live and prosper in Virginia, which is rated one of the best places to live, work, start a business, and raise a family.
item.author: Barbara Comstock

item.title: Over the past four years, we in Virginia have kept the American Dream alive by observing the President's policies ­ and DOING THE OPPOSITE.
item.author: Barbara Comstock

item.title: If reelected, President Obama would double down on his job-destroying policies:
item.author: Barbara Comstock

item.title: ·He promises to raise our taxes and hurt working families.
item.author: Barbara Comstock

item.title: ·His budget failure threatens to slash 200,000 national security and high-tech jobs in Virginia.
item.author: Barbara Comstock

item.title: ·His war on success undermines individual initiative and innovation.
item.author: Barbara Comstock

item.title: Obama isn't working. President Mitt Romney and Vice President Paul Ryan WILL. They have a common-sense plan to reward and unleash our entrepreneurs and innovators and put America back to work.
item.author: Barbara Comstock

item.title: They will be unapologetic in championing the American Dream.
item.author: Barbara Comstock

item.title: In 70 days, let's renew our Founding Fathers' victory for freedom. Let's guarantee that our children and their children continue this American story of freedom, opportunity and prosperity for all.
item.author: Barbara Comstock
